p.s: Environmental pollution has been a problem for decades.
With rising contamination it should be our job to keep the Earthearth in a good state.
While there are many pros, such as going by car, plane or ships, this is very bad for the environment.
Other pro arguments might be the production of utilities and gadgets mankind might need.
Also rising technology can have a big impact on upgrading the quality of life on Earthearth.
But it is to consider, that with a contaminated atmosphere and no drinking water there is no point for all of that, since the conditions for life aren't given.
To change that, we need ot change our habits, that being things as to recycle, and clean the environment in organizations that focus on removing environmental pollution.
Other ways of contributing are e.g. things like buying less products with plastic packaging.
